fosters.name: Toothless
fosters.description: Toothless is an instant purr machine and very affectionate. He likes to cuddle and while doing so you can admire his beautiful face! It's not required, but if looking for 2 kittens, Blair would like to be adopted with Light Fury or Meatlug!
fosters.spayedNeutered: No, but we can help you schedule that appointment.

fosters.name: Light Fury
fosters.description: When Light Fury first arrived to her foster's home, she was very shy and hissy. Once she felt comfortable, she allowed her foster parent to shower her with love. She loves to explore her foster parent's home and has overcome her fear of humans and will gladly sit in a human's lap and purr. She gets along with the other kittens in the home but loves to be independent.
fosters.spayedNeutered: No, but we can help you schedule that appointment.

fosters.name: Meatlug
fosters.description: Meatlug is a shy but an affectionate kitten. She is curious but still seems a little reluctant to join in the general fray of her group. Luckily, Meatlug is still young and impressionable so there is much optimism that her personality will change over time.
fosters.spayedNeutered: No, but we can help you schedule that appointment.

fosters.name: Stormfly
fosters.description: Stormfly is a social butterfly with the humans and really likes sitting in laps. He loves to interact with visitors and is engaged with his surroundings. Andre likes to give and receive love so will really make a wonderful companion! Stormfly also gets along with other cats as well.

fosters.name: Hookfang
fosters.description: Hookfang really loves Temptations treats so that is a great way to win him over. He also likes to play with wand toys and anything that jingles or he can chase. Hookfang likes being around other cats and will play fight all day long.

fosters.name: Leonardo
fosters.description: Leonardo is very energetic and loves to chase wand toys. He also loves to climb and you can usually find him at the highest point of any cat tree! Leonardo enjoys being petted all over and will seek you out for affection.
fosters.spayedNeutered: No, but we can help you schedule that appointment.

fosters.name: Donatello
fosters.description: Donatello is very active and loves to run and jump. He is also good at puzzle type toys that require some kitty smarts to figure out. He really likes having his ears scratched and he loves snuggling with humans
fosters.spayedNeutered: No, but we can help you schedule that appointment.

fosters.name: Raphael
fosters.description: Raphael is a little hissy meeting new kittens but fun eventually takes over and he ends up playing with them. He enjoys back scratches and belly rubs so much that he will go looking for attention to get them.
fosters.spayedNeutered: No, but we can help you schedule that appointment.

fosters.name: Michelangelo
fosters.description: Donatello is a little bit shy but enjoys being petted once he checks you out. He likes the company of other kittens and can be a bit chatty if you leave him alone without a friend. He will do great in a multi-pet home!
fosters.spayedNeutered: No, but we can help you schedule that appointment.

fosters.name: Shredder
fosters.description: Shredder is an independent cat. She doesn't seem to mind other cats, but also hasn't actively sought out a cat friend yet. She likes to chill in a cozy bed observing the scene and is receptive to slow petting.

fosters.name: Moon
fosters.description: Moon is by far the most “chill” kitten out of his litter. He is so easy going and sweet!! He is VERY comfortable around the 2 dogs that he gets to spend time with currently and loves to snuggle with his foster parent at bed time. This guy is purrfect and he is looking forward to finding his forever home!
fosters.spayedNeutered: No, but we can help you schedule that appointment.

fosters.name: Venus
fosters.description: Venus is curious about everything! She was the first in her litter to figure out how to do things. She doesn't play as much as her siblings but probably because there are five of them so she felt okay being independent. Venus also gets along with the 2 dogs she is currently living with.
fosters.spayedNeutered: No, but we can help you schedule that appointment.

fosters.name: Mars
fosters.description: Mars was shy at first when arriving to his foster home but once he warmed up, he came to sit near his foster parent. He doesn't like being picked up or held on his back but will otherwise enjoy belly scratching when just laying around. Mercury loves playing with a feather wand toy and enjoys cuddling with his siblings.
fosters.spayedNeutered: No, but we can help you schedule that appointment.

fosters.name: Mercury
fosters.description: Mercury is the smallest in his litter so sometimes he acts a little insecure. He will occasionally growl if a new pet is near or if someone is trying to take his food. Mercury enjoys being petted but not being held. He loves to snuggle with his siblings on a cozy blanket. It will be best if he gets adopted with one of his siblings!
fosters.spayedNeutered: No, but we can help you schedule that appointment.

fosters.name: Jupiter
fosters.description: Jupiter is curious about everything! She was the first in her litter to figure out how to do things. She doesn't play as much as her siblings but probably because there are five of them so she felt okay being independent. Jupiter also gets along with the 2 dogs she is currently living with.
fosters.spayedNeutered: No, but we can help you schedule that appointment.
